page.title: 18INDUSTRY 2 Melton R. Elsham
page.content: A grant of Â£876,510 from the D.of E. was made to reclaim this site and this started in early 1984,involving drainage,construction of access roads from A15,and lighting.The site is currently 50 acres,but the district planning authority,Glanford Borough Council will keep this under review. Regulations exist to preserve the natural setting and rural atmosphere. Euroshires moved to this site 18 mts. ago,and now occupies 3 plots.This Co. stores Norsk Hydro and Brit-Ag prod- ucts made in Immingham or Barton respectively,distributes all over the U.K.,and employs 6 men here. A grain store is also being constructed. Some industry is also at Moor Farm (pg 19) The area has Development Area status etc:for more information contact the South Humberside Business Advice Centre tel 0652 57637 who helped us.
